from flows.cli.enrich_spotify_artists_granular import IdentifyMissingArtistsCLI
return IdentifyMissingArtistsCLI().execute(limit=50, batch_size=10)

nodes.name: Identify Missing Artists
nodes.notes: Uses DuckDB to efficiently identify missing artists and create batch plan

nodes.name: Split Into Batches
nodes.notes: Splits the batch plan into individual batch items for parallel processing

parameters.pythonCode:
from flows.cli.enrich_spotify_artists_granular import FetchArtistBatchCLI

batch_index = _item["json"]["batch_index"]
offset = _item["json"]["offset"]
batch_size = _item["json"]["size"]

return FetchArtistBatchCLI().execute(
    batch_index=batch_index,
    offset=offset,
    batch_size=batch_size
)

nodes.name: Fetch Artist Batch
nodes.notes: Fetches artist data from Spotify API for this specific batch

nodes.name: Write Artist Data
nodes.notes: Writes artist data to spotify_artists parquet table using merge mode

nodes.name: Extract Artist Genres
nodes.notes: Extracts genre data and writes to spotify_artist_genre parquet table
